actions.text: The House Committee on Appropriations reported an original measure, H. Rept. 119-217, by Mr. Diaz-Balart.
Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 177.

official_title: Making appropriations for National Security, Department of State, and Related Programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes.
short_title: National Security, Department of State, and Related Programs Appropriations Act, 2026
